Changelog
=========

1.1.0
-----
 - removed support for Python < 3.7
 - updated doctests

1.0.4
-----
 - updated Gitlab-CI configuration
 - removed Travis-CI configuration

1.0.3
-----
 - updated doctests

1.0.2
-----
 - version upgrade for buildout version mismatch

1.0.1
-----
 - updated doctests

1.0.0
-----
 - initial release
